name: pleroma
tagline: A lightweight federated social networking server
description: Pleroma is a lightweight federated social network built using Elixir and Phoenix. It supports ActivityPub federation, custom themes, chat, and scalable self-hosted deployments.

features.title: Federated Social Network
features.description: Connect with users across Mastodon, Pleroma, and other ActivityPub platforms

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Built with Elixir for efficient resource usage and scalability on modest hardware

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize the interface with custom CSS themes and color schemes

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Share text, images, videos, and polls with followers in your timeline

features.title: Chat Functionality
features.description: Send direct messages and participate in group chats with other users
